name: Pizza Delivery (kooliooolio)
description:
In this dystopian city, pizza has been OUTLAWED, and it is your job to give pizza to those who need it. In this third-person 3D Platformer you will explore the depths of the underground pizza-trafficking ring; and all of its dirty secrets...

Do you have what it takes?

CONTROLS:

Q - Movement mode

W - Rotation mode

Space - Restarts level

To control the pizza you will have to go into either movement or rotation mode, and then swipe across the strip at the bottom of the screen with your mouse to trigger the movement or rotation.

The movement is faster the slower you swipe your mouse

YOU WIN ONCE YOU SEE A LARGE RED CUBE
